nodes.text: The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons

The fourth book in Del Rey's Essential Guide series, The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons features an in-depth look at one hundred planets, moons, and asteroids from the original trilogy and Expanded Universe, each with its own two-page spread. In 2009 an updated version, The Essential Atlas, was released.
THE ULTIMATE RESOURCE TO THE WORLDS OF THE STAR WARS GALAXY

From the sun-baked deserts of Tatooine to the frost-bitten snowscape of Hoth to the misty swamps of Dagobah, here's your expert guide to the one hundred most fascinating worlds of the extraordinary Star Wars universe. Travel from the Deep Core to the Outer Rim Territories and discover the wonders of:

EXPLORE THE TERRAIN, MEET THE INHABITANTS AND UNCOVER THE SECRETS OF THESE AND MANY, MANY MORE REMARKABLE DESTINATIONS ON A CAPTIVATING, FULLY ILLUSTRATED VOYAGE OF THE BRIGHTEST STARS OF A FANTASTIC UNIVERSE
This is a gallery of the cover variations of The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons.
